message: I have the same question as this guy: http://webapps.stackexchange.com/questions/14986/strikethrough-with-github-markdown

Admittedly, one of the reasons I want this is that I don't break up issues granularly enough, and sometimes end up with small bulleted lists in an issue description -- which I then want to cross out when they're done.
In some cases I should be making new issues; in others the list-items are trivial but still need recording (eg when blasting out a step by step as I think about the issue before diving in)
you can use html to strike thru, so try using the <strike></strike>
As the link also says, it works in live preview, but not when saved
As the link mentions, using <s> or <strike> does not work.
http://github.github.com/github-flavored-markdown/preview.html i tested it here and it works so idk what to say
and I just double checked it's not a stylesheet issue -- the <s> or <strike> tags are not present in the rendered HTML, even after a page refresh
actually just solved your probably you can use the <del> </del> tag to strike thru just tested it on an issue it works https://github.com/italiano40/convore-java-api/issues/1
huh, that's interesting. hadn't thought to try <del>. thanks!
